banner.body-copy: You may experience forks and hash rate fluctuations as the network settles over the next ~15 days.

field-error-message.invalid-url: Must be a valid URL address
field-error-message.password-too-short: Password must have at least 8 characters

ludicrousConfirmationDialog.description: Ludicrous mode may make your system unresponsive. Please confirm you want to start mining in Ludicrous mode or Tari Universe will switch back to Eco mode in
ludicrousConfirmationDialog.title: Switch to Ludicrous Mode?

warmupDialog.copy:
The Warm Up phase is a temporary period at the start of network activation, expected to last 15 days.
During this time, the network is still stabilizing, and some irregular behavior is normal. You may experience fluctuations in block times, temporary disconnects, or syncing issues. In some cases, your node might end up on a temporary fork and need to reconnect to the main chain.
Miners are still earning XTM during this phase. This period allows the system to calibrate as more miners and nodes come online, helping iron out edge cases and ensure the network is resilient under real-world conditions. No action is needed unless your node becomes stuck. Restarting or resyncing will usually resolve it. After the warm-up period, the network will transition into a more stable and predictable state.
warmupDialog.subtitle: What does this mean exactly?
warmupDialog.title: Warm up phase
